mapper.sql: USER_ID, LOGIN_NAME, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, SALT_VALUE, USER_STATE, LONGIN_TOKEN_ID, USER_CLIENT_GT_ID, USER_TYPE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_APPROVAL, USER_GPS
mapper.insert:
insert into SYS_APP_USERS
USER_ID,
LOGIN_NAME,
USER_NAME,
PASSWORD,
SALT_VALUE,
USER_STATE,
LONGIN_TOKEN_ID,
USER_CLIENT_GT_ID,
USER_TYPE,
CREATE_DATE,
UPDATE_DATE,
USER_APPROVAL,
USER_GPS,

mapper.update:
update SYS_APP_USERS
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALT_VALUE = #{saltValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_STATE = #{userState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LONGIN_TOKEN_ID = #{longinTokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_CLIENT_GT_ID = #{userClientGtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_APPROVAL = #{userApproval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_GPS = #{userGps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_APP_USERS set LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALT_VALUE = #{saltValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_STATE = #{userState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LONGIN_TOKEN_ID = #{longinTokenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_CLIENT_GT_ID = #{userClientGtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_GPS = #{userGps,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM SYS_APP_USERS
AND USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
AND LOGIN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{loginName},'%')
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT B.USER_NAME, D.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME scenicSpotName, C.ROLE_NAME AS roleName FROM SYS_APP_USERS_SPOT_ROLE A LEFT JOIN SYS_APP_USERS B ON A.PRIMARY_KEY_UID = B.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_APP_ROLE C ON A.PRIMARY_KEY_RID = C.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT D ON A.PRIMARY_KEY_PID = D.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')

SELECT E.USER_CLIENT_GT_ID, A.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME AS scenicSpotName FROM SYS_APP_USERS_SPOT_ROLE B LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT A ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = B.PRIMARY_KEY_PID LEFT JOIN SYS_APP_ROLE_RESOURCE C ON C.ROLE_ID = B.PRIMARY_KEY_RID LEFT JOIN SYS_MANAGER_APP_RES D ON D.RES_ID = C.RES_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_APP_USERS E ON E.USER_ID = B.PRIMARY_KEY_UID WHERE A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId} AND D.RES_MENU_FLAG = 'N' AND D.RES_CODE = #{resCode}
